name: envilder-alpha
description: A CLI tool to generate .env files from AWS SSM parameters

scripts.lint: biome lint --write && biome format --write && biome check --write && tsc --noEmit && secretlint **/*
scripts.npm-publish: npm run lint && npm run test-coverage && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.npm-release-patch: npm version patch && npm run npm-publish
scripts.npm-release-minor: npm version minor && npm run npm-publish
scripts.npm-release-prerelease: npm version prerelease && npm run npm-publish
